headline: Adobe AI Lawsuit And Cognizant Deal Reshape Investor Risk Reward Profile
summary: Adobe faces a lawsuit alleging it used pirated books to train its AI models. The company has announced an AI-focused collaboration with Cognizant Technology Solutions to support enterprise content creation. These developments arrive as investors assess Adobe’s AI strategy and legal exposure. Adobe (NasdaqGS: ADBE) is under pressure as legal questions about its AI training practices emerge alongside a new AI partnership with Cognizant. The stock trades at $263.97, with a 1-year return of a...

headline: Adobe Inc (ADBE)’s Upside Potential Tested by Lawsuits and Strategy Shifts
summary: Adobe Inc (NASDAQ:ADBE) is among the best S&P 500 stocks with highest upside potential. On February 11, Bloomberg reported that Adobe Inc (NASDAQ:ADBE) had been hit with a lawsuit alleging that the company willfully used pirated books to train its AI models. headline: Cognizant scales agentic AI operations through Google Cloud alliance
summary: Cognizant is establishing a Gemini Enterprise Centre of Excellence to support the standardisation and scaling of its delivery processes.

raw.headline: Cognizant scales agentic AI operations through Google Cloud alliance

headline: Cognizant to provide strategic technology services for Wallenius Wilhelmsen
summary: Cognizant (NASDAQ:CTSH) today announced an expansion of its partnership with Wallenius Wilhelmsen, the leading global provider of Roll-on/Roll-off (RoRo) and finished vehicle logistics. Under the new agreement, Cognizant will support Wallenius Wilhelmsen with technology services covering core applications and infrastructure, contributing to the company's ongoing development as an integrated supply chain partner.

raw.headline: Cognizant to provide strategic technology services for Wallenius Wilhelmsen

Under the new agreement, Cognizant will support Wallenius Wilhelmsen with technology services covering core applications and infrastructure, contributing to the company's ongoing development as an integrated supply chain partner.

headline: Reported Monday, Cognizant Advances Google Cloud Collaboration To Deploy Agentic AI Systems At Scale Through Gemini Enterprise And Dedicated Center Of Excellence
summary: Through its AI builder approach and proprietary capabilities built on Google Cloud, Cognizant is enabling enterprises to translate AI strategy into deployed, governed systems at scale.

headline: Palantir’s Pentagon Cloud Win And New Deals Test Long Term Story
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) received Pentagon authorization for its Federal Cloud Service Forward, widening use across defense environments including on-premises and edge deployments. The company renewed and expanded its multi-year partnership with Airbus for the Skywise aviation platform. Palantir announced a new collaboration with Cognizant to bring its AI tools into healthcare and broader enterprise workflows. Palantir enters this news cycle with its shares at $131.41 and a...
